name: Brooks Sherpa 7" 2-in-1 Shorts - Men's
description:
Keep your fuel and trail essentials close at hand. These shorts have plenty of pockets so you can carry everything during a run or training session.DriLayer polyester fabric is lightweight and dries quickly to keep you comfortable.Internal mesh brief wicks sweat so you stay dry and chafe-free.Elastic waistband with stretchy drawcord provides a snug fit.Sweat-resistant back pocket is large enough to carry your phone or favourite music player.Envelope pockets at each hip and a thigh pocket on the liner hold your gels, keys or cards.

        Sustainability
